title: Bloomberg Markets: Saut on Possibility of Market Pullback
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Saut on Possibility of Market Pullback
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jeffrey Saut Chief Investment Strategist Raymond James Discussing how his short-term timing model has flipped back to a bearish configuration suggesting that if there is going to be a pullback the next two weeks are the likeliest timeframe.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
